archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1108
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an agent I am able to view the customer troubleshooting outcomes/results that a customer has completed via a logged in view of self service, so that I can have an informed conversation with the customer

properties.value: Previously assumed that self-diagnostic would be a static instruction page. Is self-troubleshooting realized by an integration, or you want to build some capabilities in that regard in BSS? Maybe a questionnaire ending with a ticket registration?
Previously assumed that self-diagnostic would be a static instruction page. Is self-troubleshooting realized by an integration, or you want to build some capabilities in that regard in BSS?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
